subject: Skiing
World Cup (Skiing)
lead_paragraph: After a knee injury in January 2012 required surgery and sidelined him for the rest of the winter, as well as for the 2012-13 season, Bode Miller has returned to ski racing a changed man
snippet: After a knee injury in January 2012 required surgery and sidelined him for the rest of the winter, as well as for the 2012-13 season, Bode Miller has returned to ski racing a changed man
